hey I just wanted to clarify this in 
https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/phase0/p2p-interface.md#global-topics
```
The block is proposed by the expected proposer_index for the block's slot in the context of the current shuffling (defined by parent_root/slot). If the proposer_index cannot immediately be verified against the expected shuffling, the block MAY be queued for later processing while proposers for the block's branch are calculated.
```
For this do we require that we have each block's parent saved and processed before processing the current block. Or do we just need to simply verify that the block is valid according to the current shuffling ?
